labeldata.dwc:verbatimLocality: Collected in the North Slope Foothills of the Cen- tral Brooks Range (68°38'N ,149°34'W) , .5 km E of Toolik Lake
labeldata.dwc:habitat: moist tussock tundra domin- ated by Ledum palustre ssp . decumbens , Eriophorum vaginatum , Betula nana , and Vaccinium vitis-idaea
